Serialized Form

  • Package controller_view

    • Class controller_view.DrawingCanvas

      class DrawingCanvas extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentTool
          DrawingTool currentTool
          The current drawing tool being used on the canvas.
        • gc
          javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc
          The GraphicsContext used for drawing on this canvas.
        • hasChanges
          boolean hasChanges
          Indicates whether there are unsaved changes on the drawing canvas. If true, there are unsaved changes; if false, there are no unsaved changes.
        • height
          double height
          The height of the canvas.
        • penColor
          javafx.scene.paint.Color penColor
          The color of the pen for drawing.
        • strokeSize
          double strokeSize
          The size of the pen stroke.
        • undoRedoManager
          UndoRedoManager undoRedoManager
          Manages undo and redo actions on the canvas.
        • width
          double width
          The width of the canvas.
